author: Laura Hoy
title: Economic Recovery Hinges on Coronavirus Antibody Tests: That’s a Big Problem
description: Coronavirus antibody tests could be the key to reopening the global economy, but they're still a long way from being a magic bullet. The post Economic Recovery Hinges on Coronavirus Antibody Tests: That’s a Big Problem appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Coronavirus antibody tests offer a potential way to restart the economy without fully eradicating Covid-19.
  • But questions about their accuracy and viability could throw a wrench in those plans.
  • For now, the only plausible way to return… [+4754 chars]
